name: Fractured Breakfast Trivia Quiz | Fractured Food | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
eggs Benedict.

	A popular brunch dish, eggs Benedict is composed of toasted English muffins, poached eggs, ham or Canadian bacon, and Hollandaise sauce.

fresh squeezed orange juice.

	I like fresh-squeezed grapefruit juice, too.

questions.text: Bulging woof full swift strobe buries?
questions.correct: Belgian waffles with strawberries & Belgian waffle with strawberries
questions.explanation:
Belgian waffles with strawberries & Belgian waffle with strawberries.

	Belgian waffles are airy inside and crispy outside. They're good with fresh, sliced strawberries and whipped cream.

French toast.

	A breakfast restaurant in my neighborhood makes it with slices of crusty baguette dipped in egg flavored with almond extract. It's delectable!

A bowl of cereal.

	Grapenuts are my favorite. If you're sleepy the crunch wakes you up. Sometimes seems as if your dental work is in danger though.

crisp bacon & crispy bacon.

	I try not to eat meat, but sometimes I can't resist bacon. Soy bacon is OK, but not like the real thing.

cheese omelet & cheese omelette.

	I like omelets with parmesan cheese, sauteed mushrooms, roasted red bell peppers, and green onions.

Hashed browns & Hash browns.

	AKA fried potatoes. They're good with sauteed red onions, garlic, and a little rosemary.

over easy eggs & overeasy eggs.

	I myself don't care for runny eggs, though my nieces like them. By the way, "yegg" means "safecracker."

Buttermilk pancakes.

	AKA flapjacks, crepes, griddlecakes, and hotcakes.
